data.title: Searchable Directory of Teaching and Learning Centres in Ontario and Across Canada
data.meta_description: Teaching and Learning centres found in Ontario’s and Canada’s colleges and universities support their faculty and instructors by offering resources, tools, coaching, and training to help them enhance their teaching strategies, assessment practices, and student interaction. This searchable directory provides links to the variety of resources and tools for faculty and instructor
data.text:
Teaching and Learning centres found in Ontario’s and Canada’s colleges and universities support their faculty and instructors by offering resources, tools, coaching, and training to help them enhance their teaching strategies, assessment practices, and student interaction.

This searchable directory provides links to the variety of resources and tools for faculty and instructor training and development which are available for use by faculty at any institution.

The resources and tools available provide a comprehensive range of pedagogical and technological teaching tools and resources to faculty, instructors and teaching assistants, offering a myriad of possibilities for new skills, new understandings, and enhanced practice to ensure an exceptional learning experience for students.

Use the functionality to sort by province or institution name or enter a keyword to search the directory. Click on the institution name for the details on each teaching and learning centre.
